responseText: How kind of you. It's quite a noble gesture - not everyone is called to help their fellows I've noticed. Enough of that, though, you're not like that! Here, I've got plenty of armor kits to distribute to newcomers, part of our movement to help people get situated here on Verra. We don't want people feeling like they've been abandoned as soon as they arrived on Verra. That's how you get bandits!
name: SQ_Lionhold_ClothArmor_Turnin_7_Response
